name: Reduced Transmission offroad
description:
Here you can drive a real legendary SUVs and trucks !
In game - gorgeous graphics and very real physics .
All models are made very high quality!
And much more...

Car park :
You have to sit behind the wheel of the legendary monster of the Russian off-road.
famous UAZ and GAZ and as well as the powerful trucks Kamaz,m35, ural, Man, Zil , and more ...

Peace :
All cards are made in the best traditions of this off-road , with different conditions .

You can choose the type of cargo , and deliver it to the base , which , incidentally, it is also necessary to find a ...
There is also a Trophy card and climbing a very steep hill !
